statements: DELETE FROM SoilQualityData WHERE soil_id = 100 AND pH_level > 7.0;
DELETE FROM FarmingPractices WHERE recommended_fertilizer = 'Organic' OR optimal_season = 'Summer';
DELETE FROM FarmingPractices WHERE practice_name = 'Organic Farming';
DELETE FROM SoilAnalysisResults WHERE ph_level < 5.0 AND nitrogen_level > 2.0;
DELETE FROM farming_practices WHERE practice_name = 'Organic Farming';
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE optimal_condition = false;
DELETE FROM farming_practices WHERE crop_rotation = 'wheat' AND fertilizer_used = 'organic';
